entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate

text: @realDonaldTrump You're just passed because the real you is being exposed.  And you know that the AMERICAN PEOPLE won't stand for your lies anymore or your failure on Covid19.
